entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
